verses.verse: My <S%H1121>son,<s%> if you will <S%H3947>receive<s%> my <S%H561>words,<s%> and <S%H6845>store<s%> up my commandments within <S%H4687>you;<s%>
So as to <S%H7181>turn<s%> your <S%H241>ear<s%> to <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> and <S%H5186>apply<s%> your <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H8394>understanding;<s%>
<S%H7121>Yes,<s%> if you call out for <S%H998>discernment,<s%> and lift <S%H5414>up<s%> your <S%H6963>voice<s%> for <S%H8394>understanding;<s%>
If you <S%H1245>seek<s%> her as <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and <S%H2664>search<s%> for her as for hidden <S%H4301>treasures:<s%>
then you will <S%H995>understand<s%> the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H4672>find<s%> the <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>
For <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom.<s%> Out of his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> comes <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> and <S%H8394>understanding.<s%>
He lays <S%H6845>up<s%> sound <S%H8454>wisdom<s%> for the <S%H3477>upright.<s%> He is a <S%H4043>shield<s%> to those who <S%H1980>walk<s%> in <S%H8537>integrity;<s%>
that he may <S%H5341>guard<s%> the <S%H734>paths<s%> of <S%H4941>justice,<s%> and <S%H8104>preserve<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of his <S%H2623>saints.<s%>
Then you will <S%H995>understand<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> and <S%H4941>justice,<s%> <S%H4339>equity<s%> and every <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H4570>path.<s%>
For <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> will <S%H935>enter<s%> into your <S%H3820>heart.<s%> <S%H1847>Knowledge<s%> will be <S%H5276>pleasant<s%> to your <S%H5315>soul.<s%>
<S%H4209>Discretion<s%> will <S%H8104>watch<s%> over <S%H8394>you.<s%> Understanding will keep <S%H8104>you,<s%>
to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> you from the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H7451>evil,<s%> from the <S%H376>men<s%> who <S%H1696>speak<s%> perverse <S%H8419>things;<s%>
who <S%H5800>forsake<s%> the <S%H734>paths<s%> of <S%H3476>uprightness,<s%> to <S%H3212>walk<s%> in the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of <S%H2822>darkness;<s%>
who <S%H8056>rejoice<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H7451>evil,<s%> and <S%H1523>delight<s%> in the <S%H8419>perverseness<s%> of <S%H7451>evil;<s%>
who are <S%H6141>crooked<s%> in their <S%H734>ways,<s%> and <S%H3868>wayward<s%> in their <S%H4570>paths:<s%>
To <S%H5337>deliver<s%> you from the <S%H2114>strange<s%> <S%H802>woman,<s%> even from the <S%H5237>foreigner<s%> who <S%H2505>flatters<s%> with her <S%H561>words;<s%>
who <S%H5800>forsakes<s%> the <S%H441>friend<s%> of her <S%H5271>youth,<s%> and <S%H7911>forgets<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of her <S%H430>God:<s%>
for her <S%H1004>house<s%> leads <S%H7743>down<s%> to <S%H4194>death,<s%> her <S%H4570>paths<s%> to the <S%H7496>dead.<s%>
None who <S%H935>go<s%> to her return <S%H7725>again,<s%> neither do they <S%H5381>attain<s%> to the <S%H734>paths<s%> of <S%H2416>life:<s%>
that you may <S%H3212>walk<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H8104>men,<s%> and keep the <S%H734>paths<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous.<s%>
For the <S%H3477>upright<s%> will <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%> The <S%H8549>perfect<s%> will remain in <S%H3498>it.<s%>
But the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> will be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from the <S%H776>land.<s%> The <S%H898>treacherous<s%> will be rooted out of <S%H5255>it.<s%>
